courseDetails.title: CISSP - محترف معتمد في أمن وحماية نظم المعلومات
courseDetails.shortDescription: دليل شامل للحصول على شهادة محترف أمان نظم المعلومات
courseDetails.longDescription:
في عالمنا المترابط اليوم، أصبحت حماية المعلومات الحساسة وضمان الأمان السيبراني أمرًا حاسمًا. مع تقدم التكنولوجيا، تتطور التهديدات التي تواجه أصولنا الرقمية. هنا تأتي شهادة Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) لتلعب دورًا هامًا. تعتبر شهادة CISSP معترف بها عالميًا وتشير إلى مستوى عالٍ من الخبرة في أمان المعلومات. في هذا التقييم التحضيري، سنستكشف أساسيات شهادة CISSP ونكتشف لماذا هي خطوة حاسمة نحو حياة مهنية ناجحة في مجال الأمان السيبراني.

ما هو CISSP؟ Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) هي شهادة معروفة يقدمها (ISC)²، الهيئة الدولية للشهادات في أمان نظم المعلومات. تم تصميم شهادة CISSP للمحترفين الذين يرغبون في إظهار معرفتهم وخبرتهم في أمان المعلومات وممارسات السيبرانية.

لماذا تسعى لشهادة CISSP؟ تحمل شهادة CISSP قيمة هائلة للأفراد الساعين للحصول على حياة مهنية في أمان المعلومات. فيما يلي بعض الأسباب التي تجعل شهادة CISSP مرغوبًا فيها بشدة في الصناعة:

  1. الاعتراف العالمي: يتم الاعتراف بشهادة CISSP على نطاق عالمي كدليل على التفوق في مجال الأمان السيبراني، وحيازتها تفتح فرصًا على نطاق عالمي.

  2. طلب صناعة: مع زيادة تكرار وتعقيد هجمات القرصنة، تسعى المؤسسات بنشاط للحصول على محترفين مهرة يستطيعون حماية أصولها الرقمية. فإن أشخاص حاصلين على شهادة CISSP يطلبون بشدة في مختلف الصناعات.

  3. المعرفة الشاملة: تغطي شهادة CISSP مجموعة واسعة من الموضوعات، مما يضمن أن لدى المحترفين الحاصلين على الشهادة فهمًا شاملاً لمبادئ الأمان والممارسات والتكنولوجيات.

  4. تقدّم المهنة: يمكن أن تكون شهادة CISSP بمثابة دفع كبير لحياتك المهنية، وتفتح الأبواب أمام مناصب ذات رواتب أعلى ودور قيادية وفرص استشارية.

  5. الشبكة المهنية: بالحصول على شهادة CISSP، تتواصل مع مجتمع عالمي من المحترفين في مجال الأمان، وتوفر فرصًا للتواصل والتعاون وتبادل المعرفة.

نظرة عامة على التقييم التحضيري يلعب التقييم التحضيري دورًا في تقديم لك لعالم شهادات Certified Information Systems Security Professionals. من خلال إكمال هذا التقييم، فإنك تأخذ الخطوة الأولى نحو تعزيز المعرفة والمهارات وفرص الحياة المهنية في مجال الأمان السيبراني. مع طلب خبراء أمان المعلومات المهرة في كل الأوقات، يمكن أن تكون شهادة CISSP تذكرتك إلى حياة مثيرة وذات تأثير. لذلك، إذا كنت متحمسًا لحماية الأصول الرقمية والمساهمة في إحداث تغيير في المشهد الرقمي، فكِّر في الانطلاق في رحلة لتصبح محترفًا حائزًا على شهادة CISSP. يُعدّ خبرتك درعًا يحتاجه المؤسسات لصد التهديدات المتطورة باستمرار في المشهد الرقمي.
targetAudiences: جميع طلاب الدراسات الجامعية والعليا في مجالات الأعمال وتكنولوجيا المعلومات وعلوم الحاسوب
CISSP التحضير لامتحان.

courseDetails.title: Seed Capital Mastery: Secure Your Startup's First Funding
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlock Proven Strategies for Loans, Grants & Investment: A Comprehensive Guide for New Entrepreneurs.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Seed Capital Mastery: Secure Your Startup's First Funding," the ultimate guide for new entrepreneurs eager to fuel their business dreams. Whether you're at the ideation phase or have already launched your startup and are seeking that crucial initial funding, this course is tailored to guide you through the maze of seed capital acquisition.

Why This Course?

The journey of acquiring seed capital can be daunting, filled with pitfalls and challenges. With the guidance of an expert who has been through the grind, you can navigate this journey with confidence. This course is not just theory; it's a compilation of tried and tested strategies, real-world examples, and actionable steps that have proven effective time and again.

What Will You Learn?

  1. Strategic Approach to Funding: Dive deep into the art of being strategic in your funding pursuits. Understand the nuances of creating a high-impact plan that resonates with potential investors.

  2. Essentials of a Successful Pitch: From assembling a dream team to showcasing a track record, learn the foundational essentials that can make or break your pitch.

  3. Avoiding Common Mistakes: Be an early bird, know your business plan inside out, and understand exactly how much you need. Avoid the common mistakes that many startups make during their funding journey.

  4. Game-Changing Strategies: Discover methods that can significantly boost your chances of securing funding, such as generating initial sales, leveraging social proof, and obtaining letters of intent.

  5. Diverse Funding Sources: Explore various avenues of funding, from meeting bank managers and understanding credit scores to harnessing the power of crowdfunding, grants, and more.

Course Highlights:

  • Interactive Cashflow Template: A hands-on tool to help you forecast and manage your finances effectively.

  • Funding Source Directory: A comprehensive list of potential funding sources to explore.

  • Partnership Checklist: Ensure you're making the right decisions when considering partnerships.

What Do Our Students Say?

Younggin mentions, "I learned a lot and his years of experience is very evident throughout his lectures. All Small Businesses should take this course before looking for funding."

Darmawan from Indonesia shares, "Mr. Boomy really helped me... The lesson gave me a framework to do the real funding. Thank you, Mr. Boomy, for replying to all my messages and helping me on my journey to seek funding."

Who Is This Course For?

This course is ideal for budding entrepreneurs with a business idea looking to raise their initial seed capital. It's also perfect for small business owners aiming to grow and expand their operations. All you need is an open mind, a passion for your business, and a willingness to work hard.

About the Instructor:

With years of experience as a business adviser, the instructor has not only helped numerous entrepreneurs raise money but has also successfully secured loans and grants for his own ventures. His journey from being a small business owner to becoming a seasoned Business Adviser and University lecturer is filled with insights that he's eager to share. He has been a guiding light for hundreds, helping them kickstart their businesses and secure the funding they need.

Join us in this comprehensive course and equip yourself with the knowledge and tools to secure your startup's first funding. Your dream deserves the best start, and we're here to ensure you get it. See you inside!
targetAudiences: Existing Small Business Owners: Entrepreneurs who already run a small business but are seeking to scale up, diversify, or inject capital for growth. If you're aiming to navigate the complexities of funding avenues, from traditional loans to innovative crowdfunding, this course offers the insights you need.

Aspiring Entrepreneurs: Individuals with a business idea or vision, looking to transform their concept into a viable startup. If you're eager to understand the financial landscape and secure the necessary funding to kickstart your entrepreneurial journey, this course is tailor-made for you.

Professionals in Business Development & Consultancy: Those who advise or mentor startups and businesses on growth and funding strategies. If you're looking to enhance your consultancy toolkit with up-to-date, practical knowledge on funding, this course will be a valuable asset to your professional growth.

Students and Recent Graduates: Individuals in business, finance, or entrepreneurship programs seeking a practical complement to their academic knowledge. If you're aiming to bridge the gap between theoretical learning and real-world funding challenges, this course is an ideal fit.

courseDetails.title: Flutter Interview Questions and Answers [September 2023]
courseDetails.shortDescription: 600+ Flutter Interview Questions and Answers with In-Depth Explanations | Practice Test | Quiz
courseDetails.longDescription:
Flutter Interview Questions and Answers | Updated [September 2023]

Embark on an immersive journey into the world of Flutter development. This course is meticulously crafted to provide a holistic understanding of Flutter, spanning from its foundational concepts to intricate advanced topics. Whether you're an aspiring Flutter developer aiming to nail your job interviews or a seasoned developer wanting to test your knowledge, this course is tailor-made for you.

Course Breakdown:

  1. Basic Flutter Knowledge

    • Dive deep into the core concepts of Flutter. Understand its unique value proposition and explore the Dart language, which powers Flutter. Familiarize yourself with the essence of Flutter: widgets. Learn the nuances of stateless and stateful widgets and the overarching architecture patterns in Flutter.

  2. Advanced Flutter Concepts

    • Delve into the advanced aspects of Flutter development. Master state management techniques, unravel the mysteries of navigation and routing, and animate your apps to life with rich animations.

  3. Flutter UI/UX

    • Crafting a visually appealing and user-friendly app is paramount. In this section, unravel the tools Flutter offers for responsive design, delve into theming, and unleash your creativity with custom painting and drawing.

  4. Flutter Integration and Packages

    • Flutter doesn't exist in a vacuum. Learn how to seamlessly integrate it with native code, harness the power of its vast package ecosystem, and integrate with Firebase to create dynamic and real-time apps.

  5. Flutter Testing and Debugging

    • A developer's job isn't finished when the app is built; ensuring it runs flawlessly is just as crucial. Grasp the essentials of unit and widget testing in Flutter and sharpen your debugging skills to quickly identify and resolve issues.

  6. Flutter Best Practices and Patterns

    • Rise above the ordinary by adopting industry-recommended best practices. Organize your code efficiently, optimize app performance, and implement widely recognized design patterns to make your Flutter apps stand out.

Course Format (quiz)

Our course is uniquely structured in a quiz format. This design choice was made to ensure that learners not only grasp the theoretical aspects of Flutter but also apply their knowledge in practical scenarios. By consistently challenging yourself with our curated MCQs, you get to test your understanding, identify areas for improvement, and solidify your grasp on Flutter concepts.

We Updated Questions Regular

To keep up with the ever-evolving landscape of Flutter development, we regularly update our question bank. This ensures that you're always tested on the latest trends, tools, and best practices in the Flutter ecosystem. With our commitment to providing up-to-date content, you can be confident that you're preparing for real-world challenges and not just outdated theories.

FAQs:

  1. What is Flutter and why is it gaining popularity?

    Flutter is an open-source UI toolkit developed by Google, allowing developers to create natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase. Its hot reload feature, expressive UI, and native performance are among the reasons for its rising popularity.

  2. How is Dart related to Flutter?

    Dart is the programming language used to develop Flutter applications. It is optimized for building mobile, desktop, and web applications, making it integral to Flutter's functionality.

  3. What's the difference between Stateless and Stateful Widgets?

    Stateless Widgets are immutable, meaning their properties can't change over time, whereas Stateful Widgets maintain a mutable state and can be redrawn over their lifecycle.

  4. What are some common state management techniques in Flutter?

    Some common techniques include setState, Provider, BLoC, and Redux, each offering different levels of complexity and control.

  5. How does Flutter handle responsive design?

    Flutter uses tools like LayoutBuilder, MediaQuery, and custom logic to adapt UI elements to various screen sizes and orientations.

  6. Can Flutter integrate with native code?

    Yes, using Platform Channels, Flutter can communicate with native code, allowing for the utilization of native features and libraries.

  7. What's the importance of testing in Flutter?

    Testing ensures that your application works as expected, catching potential issues before they reach the end-users. Flutter offers both unit testing and widget testing capabilities.

  8. What are some commonly used packages in Flutter?

    Popular packages include http, dio, shared_preferences, and many others that help extend the functionality of a Flutter application.

  9. How do animations work in Flutter?

    Flutter provides a rich set of tools for creating both simple and complex animations, ranging from AnimatedContainer to explicit animations using AnimationController.

  10. What design patterns can be used in Flutter?

    Several design patterns, like BLoC, Provider, and MVVM, can be implemented in Flutter to structure and manage code efficiently.

FAQs on the MCQs:

  1. Who is the target audience for this course?

    This course is designed for Flutter enthusiasts, developers preparing for interviews, and anyone looking to test or expand their knowledge in Flutter.

  2. Do I need prior knowledge of Flutter to take this course?

    While the course covers both basic and advanced topics, having a foundational understanding of Flutter can be beneficial.

  3. How long is the course?

    The course duration varies based on the learner's pace. It's designed to be comprehensive, ensuring thorough coverage of each topic.

  4. Are there any hands-on projects or just MCQs?

    This course primarily focuses on MCQs to test and reinforce your Flutter knowledge.

  5. What if I have doubts or questions during the course?

    The course is designed to be self-explanatory, but if you have any questions, you can reach out to the course community or forum for assistance.

  6. Can I access the course material after completion?

    Yes, once enrolled, you'll have lifetime access to the course material.

  7. Is this course updated with the latest Flutter updates?

    The course aims to stay updated. As Flutter evolves, the course content will be reviewed and updated accordingly.

  8. How are the MCQs structured?

    MCQs are crafted to cover both theoretical knowledge and practical scenarios, ensuring a well-rounded understanding.

  9. Are there any interactive elements in the course?

    The primary focus is on MCQs, but the course might have interactive elements to enhance the learning experience.

  10. Can I retake the quiz if I'm not satisfied with my score?

    Yes, you can retake the quiz multiple times to improve your score and understanding.

Hi all,

this is a Docker Course for beginners.

Initially designed to be a series of Youtube videos, I later decided to join them into a whole Udemy course, as a lot of content has been added, both regarding the theory as the practice of Docker Fundamentals.

Through this course, you'll will start from ZERO and learn everything you need to know about how to start dockerizing your own software applications and sharing those at Docker Hub Cloud. You'll learn how to create and deploy multiple integrated Docker Containers using different network types. You'll learn how to use Docker CLI and Docker Compose for easily running local and remote Docker images/containers. You'll also learn how to extend and reuse public Docker Images from Docker Hub and integrate those with your own, mounting up a whole system environment, in an easy, fast and automated way.

In this course, you'll learn in 8 Lectures (12+ hours):

01 - How to Install and Test Docker on Linux

02 - Create Your First Image, Containerize a Sample App and Share It at Docker Hub

03 - Containerize and Share a Full Spring Boot Application at Docker Hub

04 - Run MySQL from inside a Container and Test It with MySQL CLI and MySQL Workbench

05 - Integrate Multiple Containers Using Links - Spring Boot and MySQL

06 - Diving Into Networking Theory - The Bridge Network Driver

07 - Bridge Network in Practice - Default (with Links) x User-Defined (no Links)

08 - Docker Compose, YAML and CLI Statements Optimizations - Final Project Run

If you've never used Docker before, welcome to this exciting, essential and extremely useful technology.

If you're already a Docker user, surely there's a lot you'll gain from this course, adding up to your previous knowledge about this amazing deployment platform.

Docker is a "MUST-KNOW" technology for anyone who works or is interested in working with Software Industry, no matter what specific interests or position one may have.

Let's start this journey together and adventure into the Dockerizing world of Docker !! Welcome aboard !!

* midi songs used at the beginning and ending of each lecture have been freely supplied by Aleksandr Shamaluev at ashamaluevmusic website.

courseDetails.title: Aptitude Test Prep : The Most Tricky Questions and More
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aptitude Test Prep. , Logical , Spatial , Verbal , Math Reasoning , Situational Judgment and Interview Questions
courseDetails.longDescription:
An Aptitude test is a structured assessment that aims to evaluate candidates' abilities to complete certain tasks and assignments without prior experience or knowledge. The world's largest organizations use pre-employment/placement tests as a part of the Applicants Tracking System (ATS) managed by third parties. Aptitude tests could be a part of the total score of the candidate (ATS may contain information as resume, personal information, previous experience, and aptitude tests results). Aptitude tests test a range of skills varying from logical thinking to spatial reasoning skills.

Nowadays, most aptitude tests' questions are asked in a tricky manner. Some people complain about struggling to pass aptitude or psychometric tests to get their jobs. The good news is that the most common reasons for failing aptitude tests are lack of preparation, not recognizing weak areas, and ignoring strong ones.  The best approach is spending 80 % of time studying the weak areas, and 20 % to brushup strong ones.

These questions will help you work on all of the four specific areas of aptitude/placement tests: Verbal Reasoning, Logical Reasoning, Spatial Reasoning, and Numerical reasoning.

Also, Situational Judgement Tests' ( that might also be a part of ATS ) questions' examples with the most effective solutions are available.

This course offers : 

1- Instructions, and tips for each test type

2- Simple yet-effective answers, and explanations

3- 142 Practice Questions including all of the aptitude tests' four areas ( Logical, Reasoning, Verbal, Numerical )

4-Extra Q&A Section

5-Situational Judgement questions, and most effective answers found through surveying

6- A Full Exam that simulates many of Aptitude Tests at major companies and organizations

7-Instructor available for help for further explanation of questions

Note no.1: Best Strategy to go through this course is to start with the general test so you could know which type of questions you should start to tackle first.

Note no.2: Answers at the Situational Judgement section is based only on surveying, and not to be considered as the absolute best. It only gives ideas to help the candidates express their authentic opinions.

Welcome to the Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900) course, designed to prepare you for the AZ-900 exam and provide you with a fundamental understanding of cloud computing and Microsoft Azure.

Cloud computing has become an essential part of modern-day technology, and Microsoft Azure is one of the leading cloud computing platforms that offer a wide range of services, including computing, storage, networking, and security. The AZ-900 certification is an introductory level certification offered by Microsoft, and this course covers all the essential concepts and topics that you need to know to pass the exam and gain a solid understanding of Microsoft Azure.

In this comprehensive course, you will learn the basics of cloud computing and Microsoft Azure, including the fundamentals of cloud computing, core Azure services, Azure pricing and support, security, privacy, compliance, and trust, and Azure management tools. You will also learn how to create and manage Azure resources using the Azure Portal, Azure PowerShell, and Azure CLI.

This course is designed to cater to the needs of different types of learners, including business stakeholders, IT professionals, students, and anyone who is interested in understanding cloud computing and its benefits. The course is divided into different sections, and each section covers a specific topic with detailed explanations, examples, and hands-on demonstrations.

Here is what you will learn in this course:

  • Understanding cloud computing and the benefits of using Microsoft Azure

  • Exploring Azure pricing, support, and service level agreements (SLAs)

  • Understanding Azure security, privacy, compliance, and trust

  • Managing Azure subscriptions, resources, and resource groups

  • Creating and managing Azure virtual machines, storage accounts, and virtual networks

  • Exploring Azure services such as Azure App Service, Azure Functions, and Azure SQL Database

  • Understanding Azure identity and access management (IAM) and Azure Active Directory (AD)

  • Preparing for the AZ-900 exam and earning your Microsoft Azure Fundamentals certification.

By the end of this course, you will have a deep understanding of Microsoft Azure and cloud computing, as well as the skills needed to manage and deploy Azure resources for your organization. You'll also be well-prepared to take and pass the AZ-900 exam, earning a valuable certification that can help you advance your career in cloud computing.

So, what are you waiting for? Enroll now in the Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900) course and start your journey to becoming a Microsoft Azure expert!

تعريف الحساس :

المصطلح الأفضل لجهاز الاستشعار هو محول الطاقة. محول الطاقة هو أي جهاز مادي يحول أحد أشكال الطاقة إلى شكل آخر. لذلك ، في حالة المستشعر ، يحول محول الطاقة بعض الظواهر الفيزيائية إلى نبضة كهربائية تحدد القراءة. الميكروفون عبارة عن مستشعر يأخذ طاقة اهتزازية (موجات صوتية) ، ويحولها إلى طاقة كهربائية بطريقة مفيدة للمكونات الأخرى في النظام لربطها مرة أخرى بالصوت الأصلي.


المحرك :

هناك نوع آخر من المحولات التي ستصادفها في العديد من أنظمة إنترنت الأشياء وهو المحول . بعبارات بسيطة ، يعمل المحول في الاتجاه العكسي لجهاز للحساس. يأخذ مدخلات كهربائية ويحولها إلى شكل مادي . على سبيل المثال ، المحرك الكهربائي والنظام الهيدروليكي والنظام الهوائي كلها أنواع مختلفة من المحركات.



التحكم :

في نظام إنترنت الأشياء النموذجي ، قد يجمع المستشعر المعلومات ويوجهها إلى مركز التحكم. هناك ، المنطق المحدد مسبقًا هو الذي يملي القرار. نتيجة لذلك ، يتحكم الأمر المقابل في المشغل استجابة لهذا الإدخال المستشعر. وبالتالي ، تعمل المستشعرات والمحركات في إنترنت الأشياء معًا من طرفي نقيض. سنناقش لاحقًا مكان وجود مركز التحكم في نظام إنترنت الأشياء الأكبر.


  • سوف تكون قادر على التعامل مع مختلف الحساسات التماثلية والرقمية

  • كيفية فحص الحساسات وما هي مميزاتها

  • سوف يتم العمل على اكثر 14 نوع من الحساسات والمحركات المختلفة

  • التعامل مع مختلف الحساسات التي تعمل بصورة مباشرة وايضا التي تعمل مع الحساسات عن طريق المكاتب الخاصة بها
targetAudiences: الكورس للمهتمين بتعلم انترنت الاشياء والانظمة المدمجة والتعامل مع الحساسات المختلفة
الكورس لطلبة الجامعات التقنية والذين لديهم مشاريع بحثية او مشاريع تخرج
الكورس للمهتمين بالتقنية بصورة عامة

courseDetails.title: C++ And PHP Complete Course 2023
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn C++ Programming Language And PHP Programming Language Complete Course 2023
courseDetails.longDescription:
C++  And PHP Complete Course 2023

Section 1: C++ Complete Course

This course will help you learn C++ basics and give you hands-on experience to create your own projects and work with computer memory. With its adaptability and fast rendering, you’ll find the C++ programming language used everywhere, from web browsers to game development and operating systems to science and machine learning tools.

This C++ Programming Course is designed to meet the industry benchmarks. This C++ programming course will give you extensive knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming in C++, Coding Styles and Design Patterns, Generic Programming and Standard Template Library.

The course examines common programming constructs as they are implemented in C++ including C++ 11. Topics include the use of C++ for memory management, file input/output (I/O), pointers, references, exceptions, and object-oriented programming. Basic data structures such as linked lists, stacks, and queues are covered in terms of their usage and implementation using C++.

Also, this course has been created to help you learn all the basics concepts that are the core of C++ Programing. This way, you will not only program in this language, but you will also understand the logic behind this programming language and will be able to create various applications in it on your own. Indeed, if you don’t have prior programming experience, the hardest part is understanding the programming logic and this course covers all the topics to help you succeed in C++ programming.

Subjects/topics you will learn through the course are

  • C++ Overview

  • Functions and variables

  • Classes

  • Operator Overloading

  • Initialization and Assignment

  • Storage Management

  • Inheritance

  • Polymorphism

  • Exception

  • Templates

Section 2: PHP Complete Course

In this course, you'll explore the basic structure of a web application, and how a web browser interacts with a web server. You'll be introduced to the request/response cycle, You'll also gain an introductory understanding of Hypertext Markup Language (HTML), as well as the basic syntax and data structures of the PHP language, variables, logic, iteration, arrays, error handling, and superglobal variables, among other elements. An introduction to Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) will allow you to style markup for webpages.

  • Basic syntax

  • Input and Output

  • Arithmetic operators

  • Conditional operators

  • Comparison operators

  • Assignment operators

  • Loops

  • Conditional statements

  • and more

See you Inside the course. Thank you
targetAudiences: Beginner in C++ development And PHP development
Beginner in software development and web development

courseDetails.title: Lightroom CC2023  Revelado digital  de cero a ninja con
courseDetails.shortDescription: Agiliza tu flujo de trabajo y aprende a revelar y organizar tus fotos de una manera profesional con Adobe Lightroom
courseDetails.longDescription:
En este curso aprenderás a manejar Lightroom con un enfoque a la productividad. Conocerás un flujo de trabajo que te ayudará a organizar tus fotos y revelarlas (postproducción) en tiempo récord, disminuyendo así tus tiempos de producción para una entrega más rápida de tus encargos fotográficos

Ya conoces el dicho que una imagen vale más que mil palabras y Lightroom te ayudará a encontrar es imagen perfecta de tu sesión fotográfica y mejorar su aspecto visual a través del módulo revelar de Lightroom.


Proyecto final

Al final de curso estará en la capacidad de ordenar y revelar tus fotos según requerimientos solicitados. Como proyecto final realizarás todo el proceso de una sesión fotográfica para importar las fotos en Lightroom. Crearás tres colecciones para organizar tus fotos de esa sesión. Luego seleccionarás la mejor fotografía para realizarle un revelado digital avanzado. Por último, comparte la fotografia con tus compañeros de clase en nuestra comunidad privada.


¿Qué incluye este curso?

Capítulo 1: Introducción

Capítulo 2: Creación de catálogos y colecciones

Capítulo 3: Revelado básico

Capítulo 4: Revelado intermedio

Capítulo 5: Revelado avanzado

Capítulo 6: Genera ingresos online con la fotografía (BONO)

Capítulo 7: Resumen y conclusión




EL curso da inicio con la presentación del profesor, quien se dedica a la fotografia escolar, es profesor de fotografía digital y Adobe certificado experto.

Aprenderás como crear un catalogo desde cero y los mejores consejos de importación y guardado de tus proyectos fotográficos


A continuación, te adentramos al mundo de la organización, etiquetado y clasificación de tus fotos. Te enseñaremos las mejores técnicas para seleccionar y depurar tus fotos para prepararlas para el revelado digital.

Conocerás técnicas y procedimientos avanzados de revelado fotográfico. Aprenderás a crear tus propios presets y verás como aplicarlos a un lote de fotografía. Además, el curso incluye a modo de BONO 900 presets con diferentes temáticas fotográficas.

Para terminar, aprenderás a integrar Photoshop y Lightroom al mismo tiempo. Con la combinación de estos programas, podrás hacer fotografías increíbles, mejorando exponencialmente su aspecto visual.

¿A quién está dirigido?

A fotógrafos principiantes o profesionales. También a personas interesadas en mejorar el aspecto visual de sus fotografías y que usen Lightroom como el programa principal para ordenar y revelar sus fotos.

Requisitos:

Computador con Adobe Photoshop Lightroom Classic instalado. Con respecto a el material necesitarás un proyecto fotográfico sin editar (si está en RAW mucho mejor)
targetAudiences: A fotógrafos principiantes o profesionales. También a personas interesadas en mejorar el aspecto visual de sus fotografías y que usen Lightroom como el programa principal para ordenar y revelar sus fotos.

courseDetails.title: Responsable de la conformité certifié (CCCO)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Evaluation
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bienvenue dans le processus d’évaluation du Chief Compliance Officer (CCO) certifié proposé par l’Institut GURUCAN. Il ne s’agit pas d’un cours, mais d’un processus d’évaluation soigneusement conçu pour aider les employés et les entreprises dans les procédures de certification internes. L’objectif de ce processus est de vérifier l’efficacité et l’intégrité du programme de conformité d’une organisation, en s’assurant qu’il fonctionne selon les normes les plus élevées.

Ce processus évalue les connaissances, les compétences et les aptitudes nécessaires pour toute personne envisageant de devenir un CCO. En visant l’excellence en matière de conformité, nous aidons à promouvoir une culture de conformité au sein des organisations et à protéger les entreprises contre les risques juridiques et de réputation qui peuvent survenir.

Pour les employés, cette évaluation offre des opportunités de croissance professionnelle, d’avancement de carrière, ainsi que le développement d’un ensemble de compétences importantes. Elle aide à renforcer leur compréhension des exigences réglementaires, des meilleures pratiques de l’industrie, et des stratégies de gestion des risques.

Pour les entreprises, cette évaluation aide à minimiser les risques juridiques et de réputation, démontre leur engagement en matière de conformité, renforce la confiance des parties prenantes et améliore ainsi leur réputation sur le marché.

Cette évaluation est disponible en trois langues : anglais, français et arabe.

Il convient de mentionner que Udemy ne fournit pas encore de certificats pour les cours qui comprennent des examens. Cependant, vous pouvez inclure votre réussite à ce test dans votre CV ou votre profil LinkedIn, en mentionnant l’Institut GURUCAN comme fournisseur d’éducation. Pour toute question ou pour obtenir un certificat, veuillez nous contacter

De plus, l’Institut Gurucan propose une variété de tests et d’évaluations couvrant un large éventail de spécialités. Cela vous offre l’opportunité de vous développer professionnellement dans un large éventail de domaines.

Veuillez visiter notre site web pour plus d’informations et de détails.
targetAudiences: Ce cours s’adresse aux personnes intéressées par la gestion de la conformité, y compris aux futurs responsables de la conformité, aux professionnels travaillant dans la conformité réglementaire et à ceux qui souhaitent améliorer leurs connaissances et compétences dans le domaine de la conformité.

courseDetails.title: Executive Certified Chief Compliance Officer (CCCO)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Assessment
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the Certified Chief Compliance Officer (CCO) Assessment offered by the GURUCAN Institute. This is not a course, but a carefully designed evaluation process meant to assist employees and corporations in internal certification procedures. The purpose of this process is to verify the efficiency and integrity of an organization’s compliance program, ensuring it operates to the highest standards.

This process evaluates the knowledge, skills, and competencies necessary for anyone aspiring to become a CCO. By striving for compliance excellence, we aid in fostering a culture of compliance within organizations and protect businesses from potential legal and reputational risks.

For employees, this assessment provides opportunities for professional growth, career advancement, as well as the development of an important skill set. It aids in enhancing their understanding of regulatory requirements, industry best practices, and risk management strategies.

For companies, this assessment helps mitigate legal and reputational risks, demonstrates their commitment to compliance, boosts stakeholder confidence, and thereby enhances their reputation in the market.

This assessment is available in three languages: English, French, and Arabic.

It’s worth mentioning that Udemy does not yet provide certificates for courses that entail exams. However, you can include your success in this test on your CV or LinkedIn profile, with GURUCAN Institute listed as the education provider. For any inquiries or to get a certificate, please contact us

In addition, the Gurucan Institute offers a variety of tests and evaluations covering a wide spectrum of specialties. This provides you with the opportunity to professionally develop in a broad range of fields.

Please visit our website for more information and details.
targetAudiences: This course is aimed at individuals interested in compliance management, including aspiring compliance officers, professionals working in regulatory compliance, and those seeking to enhance their knowledge and skills in the field of compliance.

courseDetails.title: Responsable de la sécurité certifié (CSO)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Evaluation
courseDetails.longDescription:
L’évaluation Certified Chief Security Officer (CSO) proposée par le GURUCAN Institute est une évaluation complète conçue pour évaluer les connaissances, les compétences et l’expertise des personnes aspirant à occuper ou occupant actuellement le poste de CSO au sein d’une organisation. Cette évaluation met l’accent sur différents aspects de la gestion et des pratiques de sécurité, notamment les principes de sécurité, la gestion des risques, la réponse aux incidents, le contrôle d’accès et la sécurité des réseaux.

En participant avec succès à cette évaluation, les participants peuvent démontrer leur compétence et leur expertise en matière de gestion de la sécurité. Ils mettront en valeur leurs connaissances des meilleures pratiques de l’industrie, des menaces émergentes et de leur capacité à développer et mettre en œuvre des stratégies de sécurité efficaces. Cette évaluation sert de plateforme aux participants pour renforcer leur crédibilité, augmenter leurs chances d’avancement professionnel dans le domaine de la gestion de la sécurité et améliorer leur employabilité.

L’évaluation CSO joue également un rôle essentiel pour les entreprises afin de s’assurer que les personnes nommées ou promues au poste de CSO possèdent les compétences et les connaissances nécessaires pour protéger les actifs de l’organisation. Elle aide les entreprises à identifier les lacunes en matière de compétences au sein de leur équipe de gestion de la sécurité existante, à étalonner leurs professionnels par rapport aux normes de l’industrie et à identifier les candidats potentiels pour des programmes de formation ou des initiatives de développement professionnel.

Avec l’importance croissante des mesures de sécurité dans le paysage des menaces actuel, les personnes ayant une expertise en gestion de la sécurité sont très demandées dans divers secteurs d’activité. En participant à cette évaluation et en obtenant la certification de CSO, les participants peuvent se positionner pour des opportunités de carrière enrichissantes dans des secteurs tels que la finance, les soins de santé, la technologie, le gouvernement et bien d’autres encore. Ce cours proposé par le GURUCAN Institute fournit aux participants les connaissances et les compétences nécessaires pour exceller dans le domaine de la gestion de la sécurité et contribuer à instaurer une culture de sensibilisation à la sécurité au sein des organisations.
targetAudiences: Ce cours est conçu pour les personnes intéressées à obtenir une certification pour le poste de CSO, ou pour ceux qui se préparent pour des examens administrés par d’autres institutions de certification et d’éducation. Il est approprié pour les CSO potentiels ainsi que pour les individus qui occupent déjà ce rôle.

courseDetails.title: الضابط التنفيذي المعتمد للامتثال (CCCO)
courseDetails.shortDescription: تقييم
courseDetails.longDescription:
مرحباً بك في عملية تقييم الضابط المعتمد للالتزام (CCO) التي يقدمها معهد GURUCAN. هذه ليست دورة تعليمية، بل هي عملية تقييم مصممة بعناية لمساعدة الموظفين والشركات في إجراءات التصديق الداخلية. الغرض من هذه العملية هو التحقق من كفاءة ونزاهة برنامج الامتثال في المنظمة وتأكيد أنه يعمل وفقًا لأعلى المعايير.

تقوم هذه العملية بتقييم المعرفة والمهارات والكفاءات اللازمة لأي شخص يتطلع إلى أن يصبح CCO. من خلال السعي نحو تفوق الامتثال، نساعد في تعزيز ثقافة الامتثال في المؤسسات وحماية الأعمال من المخاطر القانونية والسمعة التي قد تنشأ.

بالنسبة للموظفين، يوفر هذا التقييم فرصًا للنمو المهني والتقدم في المسيرة الوظيفية، وكذلك تطوير مجموعة من المهارات المهمة. يساعد في تعزيز فهمهم للمتطلبات التنظيمية، وأفضل الممارسات في الصناعة، واستراتيجيات إدارة المخاطر.

بالنسبة للشركات، يساعد هذا التقييم في تقليل المخاطر القانونية والسمعة ويظهر التزامها بالامتثال، مما يعزز ثقة أصحاب المصلحة وكذلك سمعتها في السوق.

هذا التقييم متوفر بثلاث لغات: الإنجليزية والفرنسية والعربية.

تجدر الإشارة إلى أن Udemy لا يقدم حتى الآن شهادات للدورات التي تتضمن امتحانات. ولكن، يمكنك تضمين نجاحك في هذا الاختبار في سيرتك الذاتية أو ملفك الشخصي على LinkedIn، مع ذكر معهد GURUCAN كمزود للتعليم. لأي استفسارات أو للحصول على شهادة، يرجى مراسلتنا

بالإضافة إلى ذلك، يقدم معهد Gurucan مجموعة متنوعة من الاختبارات والتقييمات التي تغطي مجموعة واسعة من التخصصات. هذا يوفر لك فرصة للتطور المهني في مجموعة واسعة من المجالات.

يرجى زيارة موقعنا الإلكتروني لمزيد من المعلومات والتفاصيل.
targetAudiences: تستهدف هذه الدورة الأفراد الذين يهتمون بإدارة الامتثال، بما في ذلك المهتمين بأن يصبحوا ضباط امتثال مستقبليين، والمحترفين العاملين في مجال الامتثال التنظيمي، وأولئك الذين يسعون لتعزيز معرفتهم ومهاراتهم في مجال الامتثال.

courseDetails.title: مسؤول أمن معتمد (CSO)
courseDetails.shortDescription: تقييم
courseDetails.longDescription:
تقييم مدير الأمن الرئيسي المعتمد (CSO) الذي يقدمه معهد GURUCAN هو تقييم شامل مصمم لقياس المعرفة والمهارات والخبرات الخاصة بالأفراد الطامحين لشغل أو الذين يشغلون حاليًا منصب CSO داخل المنظمة. يركز هذا التقييم على جوانب مختلفة من إدارة وممارسات الأمان ، بما في ذلك مبادئ الأمان ، وإدارة المخاطر ، واستجابة الحوادث ، والسيطرة على الوصول ، وأمان الشبكة.

من خلال إكمال هذا التقييم بنجاح ، يمكن للمشاركين أن يظهروا كفاءتهم وخبرتهم في إدارة الأمان. سيظهرون معرفتهم بأفضل الممارسات في الصناعة ، والتهديدات الناشئة ، والقدرة على تطوير وتنفيذ استراتيجيات أمان فعالة. يعتبر هذا التقييم منصة للمشاركين لتعزيز مصداقيتهم ، وزيادة فرص تقدمهم المهني في مجال إدارة الأمان ، وتحسين قابلية توظيفهم.

إن تقييم CSO يلعب أيضًا دورًا حاسمًا للشركات في التأكد من أن الأفراد المعينين أو المرقَّى إلى منصب CSO يمتلكون المهارات والمعرفة اللازمة لحماية أصول المنظمة. يساعد هذا التقييم الشركات على تحديد الثغرات في المهارات أو المجالات التي تحتاج إلى تطوير إضافي ضمن فريق إدارة الأمان الحالي لديها ، ويتيح لها قياس محترفيها في مجال إدارة الأمان مقابل المعايير الصناعية وتحديد المرشحين المحتملين لبرامج التدريب أو مبادرات التطوير المهني.

بفضل أهمية تزويد أنشطة الأمان في المؤسسات التجارية الحديثة ، فإن الأفراد الذين يتمتعون بخبرة في إدارة الأمان مطلوبون بشدة في مختلف الصناعات. من خلال المشاركة في هذا التقييم والحصول على شهادة كـ CSO ، يمكن للمشاركين أن يضعوا أنفسهم في موقف مواتٍ لفرص مهنية مجزية في قطاعات مثل التمويل والرعاية الصحية والتكنولوجيا والحكومة وغيرها. تقدم هذه الدورة التدريبية التي يقدمها معهد GURUCAN للمشاركين المعرفة والمهارات اللازمة لتفوق في مجال إدارة الأمان والإسهام في بناء ثقافة التوعية بالأمان داخل المؤسسات.
targetAudiences: هذه الدورة مصممة للأشخاص المهتمين في الحصول على شهادة لمنصب CSO ، أو لأولئك الذين يستعدون للامتحانات التي تديرها مؤسسات التعليم والتصديق الأخرى. إنه مناسب للأفراد المحتملين لمنصب CSO والأشخاص الذين يشغلون الدور بالفعل.

courseDetails.title: Certified Chief Security Officer (CSO)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Assessment
courseDetails.longDescription:
The Certified Chief Security Officer (CSO) Assessment offered by GURUCAN Institute is a comprehensive evaluation designed to assess the knowledge, skills, and expertise of individuals aspiring to or currently holding the position of a CSO within an organization. This assessment focuses on various aspects of security management and practices, including security principles, risk management, incident response, access control, and network security.

By successfully completing this assessment, participants can demonstrate their competence and expertise in security management. They will showcase their knowledge of industry best practices, emerging threats, and the ability to develop and implement effective security strategies. This assessment serves as a platform for participants to strengthen their credibility, increase their chances of career advancement in the field of security management, and enhance their marketability.

The CSO Assessment also plays a vital role for companies in ensuring that individuals appointed or promoted to the CSO position possess the necessary skills and knowledge to safeguard the organization’s assets. It helps companies identify skill gaps within their existing security management team, benchmark their professionals against industry standards, and identify potential candidates for training programs or professional development initiatives.

With the increasing importance of security measures in today’s threat landscape, individuals with expertise in security management are in high demand across various industries. By participating in this assessment and obtaining certification as a CSO, participants can position themselves for rewarding career opportunities in sectors such as finance, healthcare, technology, government, and more. This course offered by GURUCAN Institute provides participants with the necessary knowledge and skills to excel in the field of security management and contribute to building a culture of security awareness within organizations.
targetAudiences: This course is aimed at individuals who want to obtain certification for the CSO role or who wish to prepare for exams offered by other certification and learning providers. It is suitable for both aspiring CSOs and those currently holding the position.

courseDetails.title: Web3 & Cryptocurrency Market analysing Tool Using WordPress
courseDetails.shortDescription: Lets make Your 1st crypto app : Build a Dynamic Market Analysis Tool Using WordPress  - No Coding Required  & for free
courseDetails.longDescription:
Introducing a wonderful course that seamlessly blends the domains of Cryptocurrency Market Analysis and No-Code Development using wordpress . Tailored for both novices and enthusiasts, this comprehensive program equips you with indispensable proficiencies in Cryptocurrency Analysis, along with the creation of a robust, no-code Cryptocurrency Market Analysis Tool. By harnessing the capabilities of WordPress, leveraging the versatility of Elementor, and tapping into open-source GitHub resources, you'll elevate your aptitude and expand your capabilities.


Key Features of the Course:

1. Cryptocurrency Market Analysis:

Delve deep into deciphering cryptocurrency trends and making well-informed decisions. Develop a solid grasp of vital concepts, market indicators, and strategies for interpreting data, all pivotal for successful trading. Through practical instances and interactive exercises, master the art of utilizing data visualization and analytics to predict market fluctuations with precision.


2. Crafting a No-Code Cryptocurrency Analysis Tool:

Embark on a voyage to create a potent Cryptocurrency Market Analysis Tool. Explore the architecture, functionalities, and seamless integration of the tool with WordPress and Elementor. Utilize the power of these platforms sans coding, while integrating real-time data feeds and analytical insights for an enriched user experience.


3. Leveraging WordPress and Elementor:

Harness the adaptability of WordPress and the user-friendliness of Elementor to craft a visually striking online presence. Design your website to showcase your Cryptocurrency Analysis Tool using an intuitive drag-and-drop approach.
